resp:

From the above analysis, Row 9 matches the career period "1946 - 1960" and has 61 matches. However, it does not have 2727.2 overs or 6704 runs.

Row 7 has 2727.2 overs and 6704 runs but a different career period (1952 - 1964) and 63 matches.

Since no single row satisfies all conditions of the claim simultaneously, the claim is false.
